title: The Focus Mode icon is no longer in the notification bar
content:
When Focus Mode is running, the icon typically appears in the notification bar. It gives the option of taking a break or turning the mode off.

I don't know what happened, but the icon is no longer present. In order to take a break now I either have to turn it off in the settings or select an app that I blocked and choose to use it for five minutes. I don't get the pop up offering to take a break for 5, 15, or 30 minutes. 

How do I get the icon back? I tried the quick toggle icon but all that does is turn it on and off.
